alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 8:12AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Victoria County through 845 AM CDT... At 811 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, or 12 miles west of Edna, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Mission Valley, Fordtran, Salem and Nursery. This includes the following highways... US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 572. US Highway 87 between mile markers 796 and 806. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Texas.
